pr_title: [pollytts] Add text based configuration instructions to docs

timeline.message:
[pollytts] Add text based configuration instructions to docs

Signed-off-by: Breland Miley <breland@bdawg.org>

timeline.bodyText: Please remove theselines. generic addon installation instructions do not belong into the addon documentation.
timeline.author: J-N-K
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -43,6 +43,40 @@ A value of 365 removes files that have been unused for a year.
 Use "default" to select the system default audio format.
 The default audio format can be overriden with the value "mp3" or "ogg".
 
+
+### Service Configuration via Text files
+
+PollyTTS can also be installed and configured textually:
+
+#### Installing
+
+In your `$OPENHAB_ROOT/conf/services/addons.cfg` add:
+
+```
+...other stuff...
+
+voice = pollytts
+
+...other stuff...
+```
+
+This will install the Polly TTS voice addon.
